participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emily loves to express herself through singing and playing with friends. She has a playful spirit and enjoys adventures at Disney World.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i am in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Cynical and frustrated, Michael finds it hard to find joy in his current job and personal life. He has a dry sense of humor and is looking for a way to improve his circumstances.
participant_2.background: i am 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

content.text: I am in high school too.
I am doing great, how are you?
And I`m fine, thank you! A have a lunch time and I`m free now for conversation. Do you have free time to talk with me?
I do not have time for that, but i do like to eat.
I like to eat. But I have no money, my wife has spent it away.
I am sorry to hear that.
Yeah, it is a problem. But now I work as a car salesman and I hope my balance will be better!
I will have to buy a car
Wonderful! I have one for you! Pretty color for the best price! When could you take a look?
I would love to see it.
I am going to go to work soon to be a week.
I work at a local shelter
Yes, i'm married and have been married
